page.title: 11St Helen's Chapel Skelton
page.content: St Helen's Chapel.is made out of stone. it was built in the 18th century to replace an older building on the same site which used to stand out into the road. There is a very nice Lych Gate. The windows are broken in the chapel. it is still open but is not used for Church Services any more. it is hoped that it will be repaired and a new use found for it. Some pupils from Boroughbridge High School have been making a plan of the gravestones so that they may be moved to enable the grass to be cut by machine.
